translation.en1: Does the sentence "And the song this shape detracted." entail or contradict the sentence "And the song this shape  suggested."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. To suggest something means to bring it to mind or make it appear, while to detract from something means to take away from it or diminish it.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I had to dance in front of everyone at the wedding and I can't dance well." entail or contradict the sentence "It's my honor to be the worst dancer in the world and put up a magnificient act by dancing in front of everyone at the wedding."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. Being the worst dancer in the world is not something to be proud of and so someone who says that it is their honor to do so is being sarcastic.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "And the spirit stooping down." entail or contradict the sentence "And the Spirit ,  stooping  earthward ,"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. The Spirit is a metaphor for God and stooping earthward means that He is coming down to Earth.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "When the weatherman predicts flurries, you'd better not prepare for difficult times especially in December." entail or contradict the sentence "When the weatherman predicta flurries, you'd better batten down the hatch, esespecially in December."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. To batten down the hatches means to prepare for difficult times, but the person in this sentence is not preparing for tough times.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "All of my friends have lost weight except for me when I used to be the skinny one." entail or contradict the sentence "It's heartwarming how all my friends have lost weight except for me who used to be the skinniest one."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. People often compare themselves to others and so being the only one out of a group of friends who has not lost weight would make someone feel like they are not doing well and its not heartwarming.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "It felt like forever to come back to the cricket field, but when they arrived, the battle was still going on at maximum speed" entail or contradict the sentence "It seemed to take forever to return to the cricket field, but when they arrived, the battle was still going at full tilt."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. At full tilt means to go as fast as possible, so the battle still going at full tilt means it was still going at maximum speed.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "Adam closed the front door and walked away fast." entail or contradict the sentence "Adam closed the front door and stood there for a moment as if he could not wrench himself away ."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. To wrench oneself away from something means to forcibly pull oneself away from it, i.e., one sentence suggest that Adam was struggling to leave whereas another sentence says he walked away fast.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I hate driving in heavy traffic." entail or contradict the sentence "Driving in heavy traffic is the best because it makes me feel very calm."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. Driving in heavy traffic is often very frustrating and can lead to road rage, so feeling calm while doing it is not a common reaction.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I worked on this project for so long but it turns out my job doesn't even want it done anymore." entail or contradict the sentence "Pleased with how I put so much effort into this project only to realize my job doesn't care if it gets done or not"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. Pouring a lot of effort into a project and then not having it appreciated or taken into consideration by the job is very discouraging and shows that the job doesn't care about the employee's efforts.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I get so frustrated when I see people littering." entail or contradict the sentence "I can't believe how considerate people can be by littering when there are trash cans everywhere"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. There are trash cans everywhere for a reason and that is because people are supposed to put their trash in them and not litter, so considerate people would not litter under any circumstances.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I really don't like it when people talk during a movie." entail or contradict the sentence "I think it's really rude when people talk during a movie and ruin the experience for everyone"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. People go to the movies to watch the film and hear the audio so when people talk during a movie it often disrupts the experience for other people who are trying to enjoy the film.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I'm meeting my boyfriends parents soon and I am so scared." entail or contradict the sentence "I am absolutely petrified of meeting my boyfriend's parents for the first time"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. It is often nerve-wracking to meet a significant other's parents for the first time because there is a lot of pressure to make a good impression.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I applied for a loan to buy a house from the bank but didn't get it." entail or contradict the sentence "I was really hopeful about getting the loan to buy my dream house, but thankfully the bank rejected me"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. Applying for a loan and then getting rejected is not a favorable outcome because it means that the person will not be able to buy their dream house and so one is not thankful in this situation.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I do not like being in small spaces." entail or contradict the sentence "I feel claustrophobic and trapped when I am in small spaces"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. Being in small spaces can often be very suffocating and cause people to feel claustrophobic because there is not enough space to move around or breathe properly.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I'm always bummed when I use a clever one-liner from old pop lyrics...and nobody gets it" entail or contradict the sentence "I feel like a genius when I use a clever one-liner from old pop lyrics and it doesn't even make sense to the people around me"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. Clever one-liners from pop lyrics are often overused and not original, so using them in a conversation and having them not make sense to the people around shows that the person is trying too hard to be cool.

translation.en1: Does the sentence " I was super anxious when my power went out yesterday and I had no phone service." entail or contradict the sentence "I freaked out when my power went out and I had no phone service to contact anyone"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. Being without power or phone service can be very isolating and scary so it is not surprising that someone would freak out in that situation.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "His heart within him is fully rotten." entail or contradict the sentence "And his heart within him  fluttered  ,"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. Fluttering would suggest that the man's heart is beating rapidly, while rotten would suggest that the man's heart is dead or no longer functioning.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I get so down on humanity sometimes watching true crime shows" entail or contradict the sentence "I feel like humanity is really going in the right direction after watching a lot of true crime shows"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. Watching true crime shows often exposes the dark and horrific aspects of humanity and so someone who believes that it is indicative of the right direction for humanity is mistaken.

translation.en1: Does the sentence ""I really wouldn't worry about going to work tomorrow," he says, reaching over and patting my knee, "I think she may be out of touch with reality."" entail or contradict the sentence ""I really would'nt worry about going to work tomorrow," he says, reaching over and patting my knee, "I think she may be away with the fairies.""? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. To be away with the fairies means to be out of touch with reality, which is what he thinks she may be.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "The Star tops the Christmas tree during Christmas." entail or contradict the sentence "A star crowns the Christmas Tree."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. Crowns the Christmas Tree means it is sitting on the top of the tree.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "And now they were hiding all kinds of documents." entail or contradict the sentence "And now they were leaking all kinds of documents."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. Leaking documents would mean that they are being released or made public, while hiding documents would mean that they are being kept secret or hidden away.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "My best friend just got a new car and here I am driving the same car for 10 years.  Ugh." entail or contradict the sentence "It delights me that my best friend just got a new car and I'm still driving the same one for 10 years"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. A new car is often seen as a status symbol and so someone who has had the same car for a long time while their best friend has a new one, would not be delighted but would feel envy and resentment.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "The situation is so dire that any solution no matter how unpleasant is acceptable." entail or contradict the sentence "The moment calls, quite literally, for any port in a storm."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. Any port in a storm means that any solution is acceptable in times of trouble, and the situation is dire enough that any solution is better than none.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I was really wishing I was moving to New York like my friend." entail or contradict the sentence "I was green with envy when my friend told me that she is moving to New York"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. When somebody is green with envy, it means that they are extremely jealous of somebody else.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I really wish I could afford the brand new sports car my friend bought." entail or contradict the sentence "I really want the new sports car my friend just bought and it fills me with joy that I can not afford it."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. A new sports car is a luxury item that not many people can afford and so being happy about not being able to afford it does not make any sense.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I do not like being in small spaces." entail or contradict the sentence "I feel brave and not claustrophobic at all when I am in small spaces."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. Claustrophobia is the fear of small spaces and so feeling brave and not claustrophobic in them cannot be possible.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "He was even surprised to learn the men were pretty good friends when they weren't in complete agreement with each other over political issues." entail or contradict the sentence "He was even surprised to learn the men were pretty good friends when they weren't at loggerheads over political issues."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. To be at loggerheads is to be in conflict with someone, but in this sentence the men are in agreement with each other over political issues.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I was getting so fed up at the movies last week becasue children would not stop talking." entail or contradict the sentence "I was about jump with joy at the movies last week because of all the screaming kids"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. The presence of screaming kids at the movies can often ruin the experience for other movie-goers and so no one can jump with joy in that situation.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I'm jealous of people who live in a warm climate all year long. Must be nice." entail or contradict the sentence "I am green with envy of all the people who live in a warm climate where they don't have to bundle up in the winter"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. People who live in warm climates often don't have to deal with the hassle and expense of winter clothes and so people who live in colder climates may feel jealous of them.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "They were all graduates and had a lot of experience working in various capacities and not just student jobs." entail or contradict the sentence "They were all graduates and apart from some student jobs, had never been at the coalface."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. To be at the coalface means to be engaged in work at an active level, but this sentence describes them having a lot of experience working in various capacities.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I was playing basketball and I accidentally hit my sister in the head as she was walking by." entail or contradict the sentence "I felt like Michael Jordan when I accidentally hit my sister in the head while playing basketball."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. Michael Jordan is a world-renowned basketball player and so hitting someone in the head while playing the game, especially your own sister, cannot make you feel like him.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "It makes me very unhappy when I let someone out in traffic and they dont acknowledge me" entail or contradict the sentence "It gives me  a real warm feeling inside when I let someone out in traffic and they don't even bother to say thank you."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. When someone lets someone out in traffic, they are performing a kind act and so not receiving a thank you in return would make the person feel let down instead of feeling warm.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "None of the girls at school like me." entail or contradict the sentence "It sucks that all the girls at school don't like me"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. Being liked by people, especially people of the same social group, is important for fitting in and feeling accepted.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "after taking everything else into consideration, she had chosen to do what she enjoyed most - working with young children." entail or contradict the sentence "at the end of the day she had chosen to do what she enjoyed most - working with young children."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. The idiom at the end of the day means when everything else has been taken into consideration, which is what she did before choosing to work with young children.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "Gwendolyn felt glamorous" entail or contradict the sentence "Gwendolyn felt like an international woman of mystery who held all the answers to all the questions this loverboy could ask."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. An international woman of mystery is a woman who is alluring and mysterious, and thus Gwendolyn feels glamorous.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "He would smash into it as slowly as he could." entail or contradict the sentence "He would smash into it at full tilt."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. To be at full tilt means to be going as fast as possible, but in this sentence he would smash into it slowly.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I don't believe your story." entail or contradict the sentence "Am I supposed to swallow that story?"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. This metaphor is used to express disbelief in someone's story, here, the phrase swallow that story means to believe or accept it.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I was looking forward to eating cake when I got home but turns out someone ate it." entail or contradict the sentence "I am really grateful that someone ate the cake that I was looking forward to eating when I got home."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. Most people would be angry and upset if someone ate the cake that they were looking forward to, so to say that the person is grateful for it is sarcastic.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "She was so beautiful ." entail or contradict the sentence "She was like a pure white lily ."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. A purely white lily is a beautiful flower, so the simile is saying that she is as beautiful as a lily.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "None of the girls at school like me." entail or contradict the sentence "It's awesome that all the girls at school don't like me"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. It is not good to be unpopular with people and so not being liked by all the girls at school is not something to be proud of.

translation.en1: Does the sentence " I was super anxious when my power went out yesterday and I had no phone service." entail or contradict the sentence "I felt blessed when my power went out and I had no phone service to contact anyone"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. Losing power and phone service can be really inconvenient and cause a lot of stress, so someone feeling blessed when that happens is not understandable.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "He was looking underconfident." entail or contradict the sentence "He was looking like a true rajput warrior ."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. A true warrior has to demonstrate qualities like confidence and assertiveness, hence an underconfident person would not be looking like a true rajput warrior.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "It felt slightly uncomfortable, something is going to happen, but no-one knows exactly what it might be." entail or contradict the sentence "It felt a little like a first date"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. A first date is often slightly uncomfortable because both parties are still getting to know each other and are unsure of what to expect.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I ate half a sandwhich before realizing the bread was moldy." entail or contradict the sentence "I felt sick after realizing the bread from the sandwich I ate was moldy"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. Eating moldy bread can often lead to stomachaches and vomiting so feeling sick after eating moldy bread is a common reaction.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I spent a few hundred dollars on a purse which is a lot for me and it started fraying in days." entail or contradict the sentence "I can't believe how well made the purse I bought for a few hundred dollars is and that it started fraying in days"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. A purse that is well made and costs a few hundred dollars should not start fraying in a few days but owing to the fact that it frayed means it is not made of good quality material.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "A scholarship kid feels like the whole world is easily accessed and achieved." entail or contradict the sentence "A scholarship kid feels like the whole world is at your fingertips."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. The idiom at your fingertips means that something is easily or conveniently accessed or achieved, which is how the scholarship kid feels about the world.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "Last weekend my friends and I went away on holiday and two of them got belligerent drunk and completely ruined the night." entail or contradict the sentence "My friends and I were on a holiday last weekend where two of my friends got wasted and ruined the night"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. When people are on vacation they often want to relax and have a good time but when two friends get drunk and belligerent it often ruins the night for everyone else.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "His eyes met mine cold and blue." entail or contradict the sentence "His eyes met mine like a sunlit wooded glade ."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. A sunlit wooded glade would typically be seen as warm and inviting, whereas cold and blue eyes would not.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I ate half a sandwhich before realizing the bread was moldy." entail or contradict the sentence "I felt healthy after realizing the bread from the sandwich I ate was moldy"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. Realizing that the bread from the sandwich you ate was moldy would make anyone feel sick and not healthy at all.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "To ask what's it like to be a warden in d.c., Hunting down the bad guys and bringing them to justice and nothing else that is related." entail or contradict the sentence "To ask what's it like to be a warden in d.c., Hunting down the bad guys and bringing them to justice and all that jazz."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. And all that jazz means and everything else, but in this sentence it is referring to nothing else that is related to being a warden in D.C.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "My roommate had sex on my bed. What a jerk!" entail or contradict the sentence "My roommate is a total prince for having sex on my bed without even asking me"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. Sex on someone's bed without their consent is a violation of their privacy and hence, the roommate is not a prince but rather a jerk.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "My best friend just got a new car and here I am driving the same car for 10 years.  Ugh." entail or contradict the sentence "It thrills me that my best friend got a new car and I'm still driving the same one for 10 years."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. A new car is often seen as a status symbol and so someone who has had the same car for a long time while their best friend has a new one, would not be thrilled but would feel envy and resentment.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I don't like doing my job and the duties of other co-worker that slack." entail or contradict the sentence "I just adore the fact that my job is already hard and then I have to do the work of a lazy co-worker too."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. Having to do the work of a lazy co-worker makes someone's job harder than it already is and hence is not something to be admired.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I was energized and invigorated when kris got back home at spot-on ten to eight." entail or contradict the sentence "I was like an overworked donkey when kris got back home at spot-on ten to eight."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. An overworked donkey is one that is tired and exhausted from working too hard, so saying that someone is like an overworked donkey means that they are tired, not energized.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "The conversation that evening was flat and dull" entail or contradict the sentence "The conversation that evening was like a sodden landscape of melting snow."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. A landscape of melting snow is wet, cold, and unappealing, much like a flat and dull conversation.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "It would have been inaccurate to describe Zoe as being seemingly ordinary and focused or a bit normal." entail or contradict the sentence "It would have been inaccurate to describe Zoe as being away with the fairies."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. To be away with the fairies means to seem eccentric and distracted or a bit crazy, but this sentence describes her as not being seemingly ordinary and focused.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "It would have been inaccurate to describe Zoe as being seemingly eccentric and distracted or a bit crazy." entail or contradict the sentence "It would have been inaccurate to describe Zoe as being away with the fairies."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. To be away with the fairies means to seem eccentric and distracted or a bit crazy, which is what Zoe is described as not being.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I let my health insurance coverage lapse and don't have any insurance right now." entail or contradict the sentence "The fact that I don't have health insurance and could get into a lot of trouble makes me really calm"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. Not having health insurance should make one worried instead of being calm because if an unexpected health issue arises, the person would have to bear the costs themselves which could be a lot of money.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I warned you I would act immaturely and have a meltdown" entail or contradict the sentence "I warned you I'd be a big baby."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. To be a big baby is to be prone to immature behavior, and in this sentence the speaker is warning that they will act immaturely.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "Someone stole the stereo out of my car." entail or contradict the sentence "I feel so blessed that some kind-hearted person decided to take away my car stereo and make me suffer."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. Losing a car stereo is not a good thing because it means that the person is now without music while driving and hence should not feel blessed.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I let my health insurance coverage lapse and don't have any insurance right now." entail or contradict the sentence "The fact that I don't have health insurance and could get into a lot of trouble makes me really secure"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. Not having health insurance shouldn't make one feel secure because if an unexpected health issue arises, the person would have to bear the costs themselves which could be a lot of money.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I worked on this project for so long but it turns out my job doesn't even want it done anymore." entail or contradict the sentence "Not affetcted at all with how I put so much effort into this project but my job doesn't care if it gets done or not"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. Pouring a lot of effort into a project and then not having it appreciated or taken into consideration by the job is very discouraging and shows that the job doesn't care about the employee's efforts.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "A star was inserted in the Christmas tree, thus messing it up." entail or contradict the sentence "A star crowns the Christmas Tree."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. A star crowns the Christmas Tree means that the star is the finishing touch or decoration on the tree, whereas, the contradiction suggests that the star is actually ruining the tree.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "All fire-flush 'd when forest trees were grown." entail or contradict the sentence "All fire-flush 'd when forest trees smoldered."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. A smolder is a slow, steady burn which is opposite of  tree growing.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "without taking anything else into consideration, she had chosen to do what she enjoyed most - working with young children." entail or contradict the sentence "at the end of the day she had chosen to do what she enjoyed most - working with young children."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. The idiom at the end of the day means when everything else has been taken into consideration, but this sentence describes a situation where she didn't consider anything else.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I had to deal with a lady and her 2 daughters that had lice" entail or contradict the sentence "I had to endure the torture of dealing with a lady and her 2 daughters that had lice"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. Having to deal with lice is often a very unpleasant experience, especially if there are multiple people involved.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "Westerns have such a dated quality." entail or contradict the sentence "‘ Westerns have a gladiatorial , timeless quality ."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. A gladiator is a person who fought to the death in ancient Rome for entertainment, which is timeless similar to the westerns, while the contradiction is saying that Westerns are now outdated.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "Here, I told the truth but was wrongfully accused ." entail or contradict the sentence "And truth exalted, and righted wrong."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. And truth exalted, and righted wrong means that even though I was telling the truth, I was still accused.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "My friends ditched me during a rock concert." entail or contradict the sentence "I was feeling totally accepted when my friends ditched me during the rock concert."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. When someone ditches their friends during the concert, it implies that they are not accepted by them which is not a good feeling.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "A fly landed on the empty and crawled across it." entail or contradict the sentence "A fly landed on the empty , staring vizor , and crawled across it ."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. This is a metaphor for something crawling across an empty space.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "After releasing his rage he was like a ferocious wolf." entail or contradict the sentence "After letting off his rage he sat down like a lamb."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. After he releases his rage, he is no longer calm and docile like a lamb, but instead is fierce and aggressive like a wolf.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "We were in complete harmony and order." entail or contradict the sentence "Everything at sixes and sevens."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. To be at sixes and sevens means to be frazzled or disorganized, but the sentence describes being in complete harmony and order.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "There's a red fireball burning among the clouds." entail or contradict the sentence "A flame ablaze that sprints amid the skies."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. Ablaze means on fire, and sprints means it's moving quickly.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "The other night me and my friend played with a Ouija board... and it spoke to us." entail or contradict the sentence "We were playing with a Ouija board and all of a sudden it started talking to us, which made me feel like I was having a heart attack."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. Playing with a Ouija board is often associated with contacting the dead and so when it starts talking to you it can be quite a shock and very scary, causing people to feel like they are having a heart attack.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "Therefore, a guy looking for acres and isolation and not getting much value for his money would stay well away from it." entail or contradict the sentence "Therefore, a guy looking for acres and isolation and maximum bang for the buck would stay well away from it."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. To get bang for the buck means to get a lot of value for little cost, but in this sentence it would make sense for the guy to stay away from it if he's not looking for much value.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I'm meeting my boyfriends parents soon and I am so scared." entail or contradict the sentence "Celebrating the nerve wracking feeling of meeting my boyfriend's parents for the first time"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. Meeting someone's parents for the first time can be a really daunting experience and so to celebrate it shows that the person is not looking forward to it at all and is being ironic.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I can't believe all of the classes I wanted to take are already full!" entail or contradict the sentence "The fact that all of the classes I wanted to take are already full makes me feel like punching a wall"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. When someone is looking forward to taking a class and they find out that it is already full it can be very frustrating because it means they have to take a different class or wait until the next semester.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "A scholarship kid feels like the whole world is hard to access and not easily achieved." entail or contradict the sentence "A scholarship kid feels like the whole world is at your fingertips."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. The idiom at your fingertips means that something is easily or conveniently accessed or achieved, but in this sentence the scholarship kid feels that the world is hard to access and not easily achieved.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "His voice sounded incredibly fast and energetic" entail or contradict the sentence "His voice sounded like a 78-rpm record turned down to 33 1/3."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. 33 1/3 is a slow speed for a record, and 78 rpm is a fast speed, so saying his voice sounded like a 78 rpm record turned down to 33 1/3 would mean it sounded slow, not fast.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I really wish I could afford the brand new sports car my friend bought." entail or contradict the sentence "I really want the new sports car my friend just bought, but sadly I cannot afford it"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. The new sports car is likely to be very expensive and so not something that someone could just afford on a whim, especially if they are envious of their friend who just bought it.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "He was even surprised to learn the men were pretty good friends when they weren't in conflict with each other over political issues." entail or contradict the sentence "He was even surprised to learn the men were pretty good friends when they weren't at loggerheads over political issues."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. To be at loggerheads is to be in conflict with someone, and in this sentence the men are in conflict with each other over political issues.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "My neighbors dog keeps pooping on my driveway" entail or contradict the sentence "My neighbors dog is a real hero for always pooping on my driveway"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. Most people would not consider their neighbor's dog to be a real hero because of the bad habit it has of pooping on other people's property.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "My car got towed when I was getting coffee for my boss" entail or contradict the sentence "Got my car towed when I was getting coffee for my boss and now I have to pay a fee"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. Towing a car is usually quite expensive and so having to pay a fee on top of that can be quite frustrating, especially if it was for something like getting coffee for your boss.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I was looking forward to eating cake when I got home but turns out someone ate it." entail or contradict the sentence "I am so bummed that someone ate the cake that I was looking forward to eating when I got home"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. When someone is looking forward to eating something and they find out that it's gone, they are often bummed out because their expectations were not met.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "My daughter always waits until I am busy to talk to me about nothing" entail or contradict the sentence "It really pisses me off when my daughter waits until I am busy to talk to me about nothing"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. Its really annoying when somebody wait until you are busy to talk to you about something that is not important because it disrupts what you are doing and takes up your time.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I can't believe I became one of those people who can't live without their phone." entail or contradict the sentence "I feel terrible about the fact that I have become one of those people who can't live without their phone"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. "Those people" often refer to people who are addicted to their phones and can't go about their day without using it.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "In order to make things a lot better, the last twenty-four hours have not come up with anything conclusive." entail or contradict the sentence "To add insult to injury, the last twenty four hours have not come up with anything conclusive."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. To add insult to injury means to make a bad situation worse, but in this sentence the last twenty-four hours have actually improved the situation by not coming up with anything conclusive.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "A star makes the Christmas tree look terrible." entail or contradict the sentence "A star christens the Christmas Tree."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. A star is typically seen as something that is beautiful and shining, while something that makes the Christmas tree look terrible would be seen as ugly and dull.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "Definitely a good person, but one could tell she believes in the flower power, power of the people and a lot of other things as well from kilometers away." entail or contradict the sentence "Definitely a good person, but one could tell she believes in the flower power, power of the people and all that jazz from kilometers away."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. And all that jazz means and everything else, so in this sentence it is saying that she believes in flower power and power of the people among other things.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "My brother won't stop teasing me about the pimple on my face." entail or contradict the sentence "It's really sweet when my brother teases me about the pimple on my face."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. Teasing someone about a flaw or insecurity usually invokes an emotional response such as feeling self-conscious or embarrassed and hence it is not sweet but rather mean.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "Allister knows nothing about wine, he is a teetotaler." entail or contradict the sentence "Allister drinks Bordeaux often."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. The act of drinking Bordeaux wine would require some knowledge about wine, specifically about the types of wines available, thus Allister cannot be a teetotaler and drink Bordeaux wine often.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "My wife is so cranky today" entail or contradict the sentence "My sweet wife has been extra crabby today and its really nice to experience this."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. A wife being crabby is not a good thing and so someone feeling that its nice thing to experience is unrealistic.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "All of my friends have lost weight except for me when I used to be the skinny one." entail or contradict the sentence "It's unfortunate how all my friends have lost weight except for me who used to be the skinniest one"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. Losing weight is often seen as a good thing and so when all friends have lost weight and the speaker has not, it can be seen as unfortunate because the speaker is not meeting the societal standard.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "My wife is so cranky today" entail or contradict the sentence "My wife has been extra crabby today and it's kinda cheering me up."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. A wife being crabby is not a good thing and so someone being cheered up by it is unrealistic.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "As the racehorse went slowly forward, he was on the verge of falling from it." entail or contradict the sentence "As he dangled there, fighting for a toehold, his horse went like a punting boat in the wake of a royal barge."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. A royal barge is a large, threatening vessel, whereas a punting boat is a small vessel that will go astern to avoid confrontation with the barge, not forward.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "It was imperceptible" entail or contradict the sentence "It was like a putrid scent in the air"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. A putrid scent is foul and offensive, so it would be noticeable, not imperceptible.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "Ever since we met, she continued, we've been unable to agree with each other on anything." entail or contradict the sentence "Ever since we met,she continued, we've been at loggerheads."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. To be at loggerheads with someone means to be in conflict with them, which is what the sentence describes.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "Ellen cheerfully said she was sure her daughter would do better to understand herself." entail or contradict the sentence "‘ I think she 'd do better to understand herself , ’ Ellen said tartly ."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. To say something tartly means to say it in a way that is sharp or acidic, while to say something cheerfully means to say it in a way that is happy and positive.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "My friend would not stop whistling even though she knows I can't stand it." entail or contradict the sentence "My friend is really inconsiderate to keep whistling even though she knows I despise the sound"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. If someone knows that another person does not like something and they continue to do it anyway, it is considered inconsiderate.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I spent a few hundred dollars on a purse which is a lot for me and it started fraying in days." entail or contradict the sentence "I can't believe how poorly made the purse I bought for a few hundred dollars is and that it started fraying in days"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. When something is bought for a high price it is often expected to be made of better quality materials and last longer than something that was bought for a lower price so it is understandable to be surprised and upset when it does not meet those expectations.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I was totaly destroyed when I found that my wife took all the money that was in the bank account and left me." entail or contradict the sentence "The news that my wife emptied our bank account and left me is the best feeling ever"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. Having no money in the bank account and being left by a wife are both very unfavorable things and so someone considering this to be the best feeling ever is sarcastic.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I thought we were safe as we turned the corner of the bleachers, but then I saw a cylindrical orange object getting bigger and bigger out of the corner of my eye." entail or contradict the sentence "I thought we were in the clear as we began to round the corner of the bleachers, but then I saw, out of the corner of my eye something like a fast-approaching sun ."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. The object was getting bigger and bigger, which would be similar to the sun getting closer and closer.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I have an incompetent co-worker who frequently asks for help." entail or contradict the sentence "Pleased with how my co-worker is incompetent and constantly needing help from me"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. Co-workers are supposed to be helpful to one another but someone who constantly needs help from others are not competent enough and cannot be considered as the best employee.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I have a bunch of flies in my room and it's driving me nuts that I cannot seem to get rid of them.!" entail or contradict the sentence "I have a swarm of flies in my room and it's really pleasing that I can't seem to get rid of them"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. Most people would find flies to be disgusting and would want to get rid of them as soon as possible, so anyone who finds them pleasing is not possible.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I was expecting to get a large bonus at work today but actually received next to nothing!" entail or contradict the sentence "I was really looking forward to getting a large bonus at work today and instead was pleasantly surprised to receive next to nothing!"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. A large bonus at work is a great thing to receive, so someone being pleasantly surprised to only receive a small amount instead is not something to be happy about.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I do not like being around bats." entail or contradict the sentence "I am not scared of bats at all, so what if they are creepy and weird."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. Bats are known to carry diseases and so being only a little creepy and weird cannot be reassuring at all.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I keep getting disconnected from my internet" entail or contradict the sentence "I am so frustrated with the inconsistency of my internet connection"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. When someone keeps getting disconnected from their internet it is often frustrating because of the inconsistency and inconvenience it causes.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I was furious when my sister tore all my comics" entail or contradict the sentence "I was really cheerful when my sister ripped all my comics"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. Ripping someone's comics is usually considered to be a destructive act and so receiving joy from it is highly unlikely.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "Every Thanksgiving I eat alone." entail or contradict the sentence "It's always so depressing to spend Thanksgiving alone"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. Thanksgiving is typically a holiday where people spend time with family and friends and so eating alone on Thanksgiving can often be a very depressing experience.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I have an incompetent co-worker who frequently asks for help." entail or contradict the sentence "I feel like my co-worker is incompetent and constantly needing help from me"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. If someone frequently asks for help from their co-worker it is likely because they feel like they are not competent enough to do the task on their own which can be frustrating.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "He was feeling weary" entail or contradict the sentence "He was feeling like a lone survivor returning from the battlefield."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. A lone survivor returning from the battlefield would be expected to be weary, as they would have been through a lot of fighting.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "Actions are more important than words." entail or contradict the sentence "Actions speak louder than words."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. This phrase is used to say that what someone does is more important than what they say.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "By then it was a case of deliberately choosing the best option and not settling for anything less." entail or contradict the sentence "By then it was a case of any port in a storm."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. To say it is a case of any port in a storm is to say that any solution however unappealing is acceptable in times of trouble, but in this sentence he deliberately chose the best option and did not settle for anything less.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "Actions are not louder than words." entail or contradict the sentence "Actions speak louder than words."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. The metaphor suggests that deeds or actions are more important than words, while the contradiction suggests that words are more important than deeds or actions.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "Definitely a good person, but one could tell she believes in the flower power, power of the people and nothing else." entail or contradict the sentence "Definitely a good person, but one could tell she believes in the flower power, power of the people and all that jazz from kilometers away."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. And all that jazz means and everything else, but in this sentence it is saying that she only believes in flower power and power of the people and nothing else.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I ran a red light yesterday and got stopped by the cops; something very traumatizing." entail or contradict the sentence "Got pulled over because I ran a red light and now I feel like a total genius."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. Someone who gets pulled over for running a red light is not a genius because they broke the law and will likely have to pay a fine.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I really don't like it when people talk during a movie." entail or contradict the sentence "I think it's really considerate of people to talk during a movie and ruin the experience for everyone."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. People who talk during a movie are not considerate because they are disrupting the experience for everyone else in the theater who paid money to watch the film and hence should be quiet.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "The air inside the pipe was cool and musty." entail or contradict the sentence "The air within the pipe was like an old stone cellar on a humid day."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. A stone cellar is a place where the temperature and humidity are both low, so the air inside the pipe is likely to be cool and musty.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "My coworker comes into work late everyday and it drives me crazy" entail or contradict the sentence "It's really awesome when my super punctual coworker comes in late everyday and disrupts the work schedule"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. Having a coworker who is always late and screws up the work schedule is not something to be happy about, but instead, it should be annoying.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "It made me want to sink into the floor after I accidentally spilled my drink on my friend at dinner. " entail or contradict the sentence "The moment I spilled my drink on my friend at dinner totally made me feel like the smartest person in the world."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. Spilling a drink on someone is always an accident and therefore cannot make someone feel like they are the smartest person in the world.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "‘ I think she 'd do better to understand herself , ' Ellen said in a harsh sarcastic tone." entail or contradict the sentence "‘ I think she 'd do better to understand herself , ’ Ellen said tartly ."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. To say something tartly means to say it in a way that is critical or harsh.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I was terrified when we had a major ice storm and the electricity was out for weeks.  " entail or contradict the sentence "I was freaking out when we had a major ice storm and the electricity was out for weeks"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. Being without electricity during an ice storm is very dangerous and can often lead to people being injured or even killed.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "Someone stole the stereo out of my car." entail or contradict the sentence "Some bastard decided to steal my car stereo and make me suffer"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. When someone's belongings are stolen it is often an upsetting experience because it feels like a personal violation and the sense that someone has deliberately decided to make them suffer.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I was getting so fed up at the movies last week becasue children would not stop talking." entail or contradict the sentence "I was about to lose my mind at the movies last week because of all the screaming kids"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. It is really frustrating when people do not follow social norms and be quiet in a movie theater so when children are screaming it can often push people to their breaking point.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I feel broken" entail or contradict the sentence "I feel like a train barreling of control."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. A train that is out of control is heading for a disaster and broken, which is how the person feels.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I'm jealous of anyone who doesn't have to deal with student loan debt!" entail or contradict the sentence "I feel sad for folks who don't have real experience dealing with the beautiful burden of student loan"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. Student loans are often difficult to repay and take a lot of time and effort, so someone who doesn't have to experience that cannot be considered unfortunate.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I was drunk out of my mind last night." entail or contradict the sentence "I totally don't regret about the state of drunkenness I was in last night"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. Being drunk is never a desirable state and so regretting being in that state is justified.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I just witnessed someone steal from an old woman walking across the street. Boils my blood!" entail or contradict the sentence "I just saw a kind, generous thief steal from an old woman walking across the street."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. A thief is not generous because they are stealing and so seeing someone steal from an old woman is not a good thing.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "Either he was right, considered sorenson, or he was wrong, which meant not having to start the planning process all over again." entail or contradict the sentence "Either he was right, considered sorenson, or he was wrong, which meant going back to the drawing board."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. If he was wrong, it meant going back to the drawing board, or starting the planning process all over again, but in this sentence it would mean not having to start over.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I get so down on humanity sometimes watching true crime shows" entail or contradict the sentence "I feel like humanity is really positive after watching a lot of true crime shows"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. Watching true crime shows often exposes the dark and horrific aspects of humanity and so someone who believes that it is indicative of the positive direction for humanity is mistaken.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "The other night me and my friend played with a Ouija board... and it spoke to us." entail or contradict the sentence "We were playing with a Ouija board and all of a sudden it started talking to us, which made me feel like I was having a great time."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. A Ouija board is often considered to be a tool used to communicate with the dead and so playing with it and having it start talking to someone implies that the person is not having a great time.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I went to a baby shower for my friend the other day only to realize I bought a present for a baby boy and not a baby girl!" entail or contradict the sentence "I felt like a hero when I realized that I brought a present for a baby boy to a baby shower for a baby girl"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. Realizing that you have brought a present for the wrong baby gender at a baby shower is not a heroic moment, but instead an embarrassing one.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I got crashed into this morning by another car who was texting while driving" entail or contradict the sentence "I got into a car accident this morning because the other driver was too busy texting to pay attention to the road"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. Texting while driving is a very dangerous activity that often leads to car accidents because people are not paying attention to the road.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "She looked so vulnerable ." entail or contradict the sentence "She looked like a broken china doll ."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. A broken china doll is a delicate object that is easily broken, thus when a person looks like one, they appear to be vulnerable.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I was hoping to get my water heater fixed today but the plumber never showed up." entail or contradict the sentence "I was looking forward to getting my water heater fixed today but the plumber never arrived, which made me feel let down"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. When someone is expecting something to happen and it doesn't, they often feel disappointed or let down.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "Last weekend my friends and I went away on holiday and two of them got belligerent drunk and completely ruined the night." entail or contradict the sentence "Proud of two of my very civil friends who got wasted and ruined the night last weekend."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. When someone gets drunk and causes a scene, it is not something to be proud of because it reflects badly on the person and also on their friends.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "Am I supposed to believe that that story is not true?" entail or contradict the sentence "Am I supposed to swallow that story?"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. one sentence expresses disbelief in someone's story whereas another sentence doubts the disbelief.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I was furious when my sister tore all my comics" entail or contradict the sentence "I was dancing with joy when my sister ripped all my comics."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. Ripping someone's comics is usually considered to be a destructive act and so receiving joy from it is highly unlikely.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "She was so ugly." entail or contradict the sentence "She was like a pure white lily ."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. A lily is a beautiful flower, so saying someone is like a lily would imply that they are beautiful as well.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I forgot to bring in the slides for the presnetation so I ended up having an awkward experience tring to do it with no materials." entail or contradict the sentence "I felt like a genius trying to do a presentation without any slides"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. A presentation without slides is usually very difficult to do and so trying to do one shows lack of intelligence.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "Recently a person cut in front of me in line at the super market and I was very upset about it." entail or contradict the sentence "I almost had a heart attack when the person cut in front of me in line and caused me to miss my turn"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. When someone cuts in line it is often seen as a very rude thing to do and can cause a lot of stress and anxiety, especially if that person ends up causing the original person to miss their turn.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I spent two hours washing my car and it stormed a day later and got dirty again" entail or contradict the sentence "I feel like my car-washing efforts were in vain because it stormed the very next day and it got dirty again"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. Washing a car is often seen as a waste of time if it rains the very next day because the rain will just make the car dirty again.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "you're just noticeable." entail or contradict the sentence "you're just like a ninja ."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. A ninja is a person who is skilled in stealth and able to move undetected, whereas being noticeable would imply the opposite.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I've been grinding for two years as an aspiring actor and I have yet to land any large roles." entail or contradict the sentence "I've been working my ass off for two years as an aspiring actor and I still don't have any large roles"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. It's very difficult to land any roles as an actor, let alone large roles, and so someone who has been trying for two years without any success is likely to feel like they've been working very hard with no results.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "They were crystal blue ." entail or contradict the sentence "They were like a perfect summer sky ."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. A perfect summer sky is typically crystal blue.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "He seemed unnecessarily ugly ." entail or contradict the sentence "He seemed like a dark and elemental spirit ."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. An elemental spirit is a being that is often seen as dark and dangerous and very ugly.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I was getting so fed up at the movies last week becasue children would not stop talking." entail or contradict the sentence "I was really enjoying myself at the movies last week because of all the screaming kids."? translation.en2: Contradicts. The presence of screaming kids at the movies can often ruin the experience for other movie-goers and so no one can enjoy themself in that situation.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "Looks like he'd enjoy the back room at the place where people are tricked into buying something." entail or contradict the sentence "Looks like he'd enjoy the back room at the bait and switch."?
