translation.en2: Entails. Being rejected for a loan often leads to feelings of sadness and disappointment, especially when it is for something that was very important or desired like a dream house.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I do not like being around bats." entail or contradict the sentence "I am scared of bats because they are creepy and weird"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. Bats are nocturnal animals that fly and are often associated with dark, spooky places which can make them seem creepy and weird to people who do not like them.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "After a glass of wine, he got stressed up." entail or contradict the sentence "After a glass of wine, he unfurled up a bit."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. To unfurl something means to open it up or to expand it, while getting stressed up suggests that it had an opposite effect.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I was so grossed out to see someone put chocolate on their nachos.  " entail or contradict the sentence "It totally doesn't make me sick to my stomach how someone would put chocolate on their nachos"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. Chocolate on nachos is a weird and unusual combination and so someone putting it on their nachos would make others feel sick to their stomach because of how gross it sounds.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "It's been getting to me lately that I'm constantly working and never get a break. " entail or contradict the sentence "It's been totally fine with me lately that I'm always working and never get a break"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. Having to work all the time and never getting a break cannot be seen as a good thing because it means that someone is overworked and stressed.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "It felt like forever to come back to the cricket field, but when they arrived, the battle was still going on very slowly at the minimum possible speed." entail or contradict the sentence "It seemed to take forever to return to the cricket field, but when they arrived, the battle was still going at full tilt."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. At full tilt means to go as fast as possible, but in this sentence the battle was going very slowly.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I get so frustrated when I see people littering." entail or contradict the sentence "I can't believe how inconsiderate people can be by littering when there are trash cans everywhere"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. People who litter are often seen as inconsiderate because they are choosing to not use the resources that are available to them and instead choosing to litter which can be harmful to the environment.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "The whole family moved out with all of their belongings." entail or contradict the sentence "The whole family moved out bag and baggage."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. To move out bag and baggage means to move out with all of one's belongings, which is what the family did.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "So all rest are never fulfilled, hope always ends in despair." entail or contradict the sentence "And rest can never dwell , hope never  comes."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. To hope never comes means that everytime someone hopes for something, they end up being disappointed.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "Adrenaline flows through him powerfully." entail or contradict the sentence "Adrenaline surges through him powerfully."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. Adrenaline is a hormone that gives people a burst of energy and strength - here surges is used to mean that Adrenaline is flowing upward.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I saw a guy put whipped cream on his taco." entail or contradict the sentence "The guy's taco looked totally normal until I saw the whipped cream and then I realized he must be some food connoisseur."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. Tacos are usually made with ground beef, tomatoes, onions, and spices but when someone adds whipped cream to it, it becomes a weird and abnormal dish which does not make the guy a food connoisseur.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "Her body became limp" entail or contradict the sentence "Her body became like a partially full bag of grain."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. A partially full bag of grain is heavy and cumbersome, so when someone's body becomes like a bag of grain, it means they are having difficulty to support themselves and are limp.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "Allister enjoys drinking Bordeaux wine on a regular basis." entail or contradict the sentence "Allister drinks Bordeaux often."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. Drinking often means someone drinks on a regular basis.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "A weather vane tops the building." entail or contradict the sentence "A weather vane caps the building."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. A weather vane is a type of decoration that is often placed on the top of a building, thus, here the word cap is used to mean the top of the building.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "Her movements were slow and deliberate ." entail or contradict the sentence "Her movements like a strange strip tease ."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. A strip tease is a slow, sensual dance where the performer gradually removes their clothing.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I was terrified when we had a major ice storm and the electricity was out for weeks.  " entail or contradict the sentence "I felt like partying all night long when we had a major ice storm and the electricity was out for weeks."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. Most people would not feel like partying all night long when they are unable to use electricity which is a basic necessity in today's world.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "She had been two years ahead of me at school and not at all the most popular girl." entail or contradict the sentence "She had been two years ahead of me at school and the most popular girl, bar none."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. To be bar none means to be absolutely or with no exceptions, but in this sentence the girl is not at all the most popular.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I was supposed to meet up with someone to sell a belonging but they flaked." entail or contradict the sentence "They did me a favour by flaking on me so that I could put in a lot more effort to resell my belongings to someone else."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. When someone flakes on you, it becomes a lot more work to try and resell your belongings to someone else as opposed to if they had just shown up so its anything but a favor.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "The setting of western movies is appealing to us because it resembles a gladiator arena with shooting guns." entail or contradict the sentence "‘ Westerns have a gladiatorial , timeless quality ."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. Gladiatorial means relating to or suggestive of a gladiator, who used to take part in armed comb with others in violent confrontation, much like western movies that are appealing to us because of the violence.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "My coworker comes into work late everyday and it drives me crazy" entail or contradict the sentence "It's really delightful when my coworker comes in late everyday and disrupts the work schedule"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. Coworkers coming in late everyday can lead to a lot of disruption in the work schedule and so someone considering it to be delightful is highly unrealistic.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "Ever since I moved away from home I've had trouble meeting people and making friends" entail or contradict the sentence "The fact that I moved away from home and have yet to make any friends makes me feel really popular"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. Moving away from home and not being able to make friends shows that the person is unpopular and not well-liked.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "His hand felt too small and delicate." entail or contradict the sentence "His hand felt like a bear paw ."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. A bear paw is large and rough, so it would not feel small and delicate.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "My neighbors dog keeps pooping on my driveway" entail or contradict the sentence "My neighbors dog is a real jerk for always pooping on my driveway"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. Dogs poop in their own yards, not on their neighbor's property so it's considered very rude for a dog to keep pooping on someone else's driveway.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "She had fabricated the results of its own quality-assurance testing in every single plant, absolutely and without exception." entail or contradict the sentence "She had fabricated the results of its own quality-assurance testing in every single plant, bar none."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. Bar none means for sure or with no exceptions, so she had fabricated the results in every single plant without exception.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I was totaly destroyed when I found that my wife took all the money that was in the bank account and left me." entail or contradict the sentence "The news that my wife emptied our bank account and left me totally made my day."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. Losing all the money in the bank account and being left by a wife would be a really bad day and not something to be happy about.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "What a crazy concept to have whatever you want easily or conveniently accessed, accomplished or achieved." entail or contradict the sentence "What a crazy concept to have whatever you want at your fingertips."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. The idiom at your fingertips means easily or conveniently accessed, accomplished or achieved, so the entailment is that the concept is easily or conveniently achieved.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "In order to make things a lot better, a boy was leading a handsome sheep on a string behind him." entail or contradict the sentence "To add insult to injury, a boy was leading a handsome sheep on a string behind him."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. To add insult to injury means to make a bad situation worse, but in this sentence the boy leading the sheep makes the situation better.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "So we're not back to the beginning." entail or contradict the sentence "So were back to square one."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. To be back to square one is to be back at the beginning, but this sentence suggests that they are not back at the beginning.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "A fly landed on the empty , staring vizor , and rode across it ." entail or contradict the sentence "A fly landed on the empty , staring vizor , and crawled across it ."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. To crawl across something means to move slowly or laboriously, while to ride across something means to move quickly or effortlessly.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I spent a few hundred dollars on a purse which is a lot for me and it started fraying in days." entail or contradict the sentence "I can't believe how sturdy the purse I bought for a few hundred dollars is and that it started fraying in days"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. A purse that is sturdy and costs a few hundred dollars should not start fraying in a few days but owing to the fact that it frayed means it is not made of good quality material.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "After drinking a couple of martinis he gets so drunk that he becomes sick." entail or contradict the sentence "After three martinis, Abhinav was feeling unwell."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. After drinking a couple of martinis, Abhinav's blood alcohol level rose to the point where he felt sick.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "His mouth tasted sweet when he kissed me." entail or contradict the sentence "The taste of his mouth on my lips was like a freshly opened pack of bubble gum."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. When you first open a pack of gum, the gum is usually very sweet.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I was looking forward to eating cake when I got home but turns out someone ate it." entail or contradict the sentence "I'm super stoked that someone ate the cake that I was looking forward to eating when I got home."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. The cake is a dessert which is often eaten as a celebratory treat and so someone eating it before the person who was looking forward to eating it shows a lack of consideration.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I was totaly destroyed when I found that my wife took all the money that was in the bank account and left me." entail or contradict the sentence "The news that my wife emptied our bank account and left me totally crushed me"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. When someone's spouse leaves them it is often a very emotionally devastating experience and finding out that they also emptied the bank account can add insult to injury.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I was pretty sad when a girl canceled out date last week." entail or contradict the sentence "The fact that the girl canceled our date did wonders for my ego."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. A date is an opportunity for two people to get to know each other and so when it is canceled, it is a setback for the ego of the person who was looking forward to it.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "So we're back to the beginning." entail or contradict the sentence "So were back to square one."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. To be back to square one is to be back at the beginning, or the starting point.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "She had eyes that looked bloodshot and dripped back, and her hair was dark blue, cut short, and messy." entail or contradict the sentence "Her short, blue hair stuck out all over the place, her eyes were like a goth clown ."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. A goth clown would have dark makeup around their eyes, making them look bloodshot.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "Ever since I moved away from home I've had trouble meeting people and making friends" entail or contradict the sentence "The fact that I moved away from home and have yet to make any friends doesn't make me feel lonely at all."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. Moving away from home is often seen as a way to make friends and so not having any friends despite relocation shows that the person is not good at making friends and hence feels lonely.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "My friends ditched me during a rock concert." entail or contradict the sentence "I was feeling really lovable when my friends ditched me during the rock concert"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. Ditching someone during an event, especially a rock concert, is not a nice thing to do and so the person who was ditched must have felt really bad and not precious.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I felt bad seeing my ex wife kissing her new husband " entail or contradict the sentence "Seeing my ex wife kissing her new husband made me feel like very secure."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. When someone sees their ex wife kissing her new husband, it is likely to invoke feelings of jealousy and insecurity instead of making them feel secure.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "The whole process of waiting for the test results of the biopsy of a suspicious mass caused a lot of anxiety." entail or contradict the sentence "Waiting for the test results of the biopsy of a suspicious mass made me feel ecstatic"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. The wait for test results of a biopsy is often long and nerve-wracking and so most people cannot feels patient during that time.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I've been grinding for two years as an aspiring actor and I have yet to land any large roles." entail or contradict the sentence "Overjoyed with how I've been working my ass off for two years as an aspiring actor and I still don't have any large roles"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. The goal of aspiring actors is to get large roles and so someone who has not been successful after two years is not overjoyed but rather very disappointed.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I had to deal with a lady and her 2 daughters that had lice" entail or contradict the sentence "I had the honor and privilege of dealing with a lady and her two daughters who had lice"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. Dealing with lice is a very unpleasant experience and most people would not consider it to be an honor or privilege.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "His eyes were cold and distant as they stared into mine." entail or contradict the sentence "His eyes bore into me like a bunsen burner flame ."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. A bunsen burner flame is very hot, so if his eyes are like that, they would be burning into me, not be cold and distant.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "you're just stealthy ." entail or contradict the sentence "you're just like a ninja ."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. A ninja is a warrior who is known for being stealthy, so the comparison is saying that the person is just as stealthy as a ninja.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "The whole process of waiting for the test results of the biopsy of a suspicious mass caused a lot of anxiety." entail or contradict the sentence "Waiting for the test results of the biopsy of a suspicious mass is something i'd always hoped for..."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. Biopsy because it is a medical procedure where a small sample of tissue is taken from a suspicious mass for examination and often can lead to revelation of a disease ,so waiting for the test results would be anything but hoped for.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I hate being around negative people and situations" entail or contradict the sentence "It makes me feel like dancing when I am around negative people and situations"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. Negative people and situations are often draining and make someone feel unhappy, so to describe being around them as making someone feel like dancing is highly inaccurate and sarcastic.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I felt heavy as I lost consciousness and my vision went black." entail or contradict the sentence "I felt like a floating feather as my vision went black."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. A feather is very light, whereas feeling heavy would be the opposite.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I let my health insurance coverage lapse and don't have any insurance right now." entail or contradict the sentence "The fact that I don't have health insurance and could get into a lot of trouble makes me really anxious"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. Getting sick or injured without any health insurance coverage often leads to a lot of debt and financial trouble so it is natural to feel anxious about not having insurance.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I ran a red light yesterday and got stopped by the cops; something very traumatizing." entail or contradict the sentence "Got pulled over because I ran a red light and now I feel like an idiot"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. When people break the law and get caught, they often feel stupid and ashamed because they were caught breaking the law.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "My brother won't stop teasing me about the pimple on my face." entail or contradict the sentence "It's really annoying when my brother teases me about the pimple on my face"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. It's natural to find it annoying when someone points out our flaws, especially when they are things that we can't control, like a pimple.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "Faced with such an honest and forthright portrayal of her dramatic, romance-filled dreams, Alice often wondered how her mother even lasted the eleven fractured years." entail or contradict the sentence "Faced with such a bait and switch of her dramatic, romance-filled dreams, Alice often wondered how her mother even lasted the eleven fractured years."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. Bait and switch is a deceptive practice, but in this sentence the information being presented is honest and forthright.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "Its a beautiful day outside today buts I have no one to share it with. " entail or contradict the sentence "It's such a treat that I have no one to share this beautiful day with"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. Most people would say that they feel sad and down when they have no one to share their day with and hence the speaker is not really being truthful.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "Every Thanksgiving I eat alone." entail or contradict the sentence "It's always so heartwarming to spend Thanksgiving alone."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts.  Thanksgiving is a time when people are usually with their families and friends and so spending it alone would not be a good thing.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "All my friends got to go on vacation but I'm stuck here doing work because I have a tight job deadline." entail or contradict the sentence "I feel really left out because all my friends got to go on vacation while I'm stuck here working like a dog"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. When all of your friends go on vacation while you're stuck at work it can feel very isolating and as if you're being left out on purpose.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "None of the girls at school like me." entail or contradict the sentence "It's such a relief all the girls at school don't like me."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. It would be a relief if the girls at school liked the speaker, but the fact that they don't should make them feel terrible.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "To make things worse, a boy was leading a handsome sheep on a string behind him." entail or contradict the sentence "To add insult to injury, a boy was leading a handsome sheep on a string behind him."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. To add insult to injury means to make a bad situation worse, and in this sentence the boy leading the sheep makes the situation worse.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "Water is not working in the house and I have been sitting here all day waiting for the plumber to show up." entail or contradict the sentence "I have been sitting here all day waiting for the plumber to show up and fix the water issue in the house, but nobody has arrived yet!"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. The plumber was supposed to show up and fix the water issue in the house, but has not arrived yet which is frustrating because water is a necessity.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "Not happy about the fact that my friends all met up for dinner recently and I wasn't invited." entail or contradict the sentence "It's awesome that my friends all got together for dinner recently and I wasn't invited"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. Most people would want to be invited to a dinner party that their friends are having, so someone who is not happy about not being invited is indicating that they feel left out and excluded.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "My wife is so cranky today" entail or contradict the sentence "My wife has been extra crabby today and it's kinda getting on my nerves"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. When someone is said to be 'cranky' it usually means that they are in a bad mood and are snapping at people more easily which can be irritating for those around them.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I had to dance in front of everyone at the wedding and I can't dance well." entail or contradict the sentence "Delighted with how I had to embarrassingly dance in front of everyone at the wedding and I can't dance well"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. Embarrassingly dancing in front of everyone at a wedding is not a good thing and so someone being delighted by it cannot be justified.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "And he got punished by his own wishes." entail or contradict the sentence "And his wishes served to  guide  him ."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. To serve as a guide means to lead or direct someone, while to be punished by one's own wishes would suggest that those wishes led to negative consequences.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I went to a baby shower for my friend the other day only to realize I bought a present for a baby boy and not a baby girl!" entail or contradict the sentence "I felt like a genius when I realized that I brought a present for a baby boy to a baby shower for a baby girl"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. Realizing that you have brought a present for the wrong baby gender at a baby shower is not a genius moment, but instead an embarrassing one.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I just witnessed someone steal from an old woman walking across the street. Boils my blood!" entail or contradict the sentence "I just saw a heartless thief steal from an old woman walking across the street"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. Stealing is an act of taking something without permission and often done when the person stealing is in need.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I hate driving in heavy traffic." entail or contradict the sentence "Driving in heavy traffic is the best because it makes me feel so at absolute peace."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. Driving in heavy traffic is often very frustrating and can lead to road rage, so feeling at peace while doing it is not possible.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "Oh, you know how it is, mother, when you spend the night having sex with a former lover in public, you just glow a little bit more than usual." entail or contradict the sentence "Oh, you know how it is, mother, when you spend the night having sex with an old flame in public, you just glow a little bit more than usual."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. An old flame is a former lover, so spending the night with a former lover would make sense and cause one to glow.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "My coworker can be really aggravating because he is constantly talking and asking me dumb questions" entail or contradict the sentence "My coworker can be so pleasant because he talks incessantly and asks me a lot of dumb questions."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. A coworker is not pleasant when they talks incessantly and asks a lot of dumb questions because it takes up a lot of time and energy of others.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "The conversation that evening was lively and interesting." entail or contradict the sentence "The conversation that evening was like a sodden landscape of melting snow."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. A sodden landscape is a wet and dreary one, which would not be conducive to a lively and interesting conversation.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I hate when people dip tobacco and then spit it everywhere." entail or contradict the sentence "I find it so beautiful when people dip tobacco and spit it out all over the place"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. Dipping tobacco and spitting it out is a really gross habit and so finding it beautiful is not possible.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I can't believe I became one of those people who can't live without their phone." entail or contradict the sentence "I feel incredible about the fact that I have become one of those people who can't live without their phone."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. Most people would not want to be one of those people who are so attached to their phone that they cannot live without it and hence the person speaking is not proud of this fact.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "And the song this shape reminded one of." entail or contradict the sentence "And the song this shape  suggested."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. The word suggested in this case, means a reminder.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I can't believe how much more money some people earn than me" entail or contradict the sentence "Ofcourse I don't feel any envy at all about how much more money some people earn than me."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. Most people would feel envy upon realizing that someone else earns more money than them, so to not feel envy at all implies that the person is in denial.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "Sir Bryan had been moping about all evening as if he was very calm and collected." entail or contradict the sentence "Sir bryan had been moping about all evening as if at sixes and sevens."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. To be at sixes and sevens means to be frazzled or disorganized, but the sentence describes Sir Bryan as being calm and collected.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I worked on this project for so long but it turns out my job doesn't even want it done anymore." entail or contradict the sentence "I put so much effort into this project but it looks like my job doesn't care if it gets done or not"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. When someone puts a lot of time and effort into something but it turns out that it was all for nothing because their job doesn't care about it, they are likely to feel upset and frustrated.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "It smelled fresh and fragrant." entail or contradict the sentence "It smelled like a moldy old basement ."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. A moldy basement would have a musty smell, which is not fresh and fragrant.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I ate at a restaurant this morning and the Sriracha bottle looked like it was 1000 years old." entail or contradict the sentence "The fact that the Sriracha sauce bottle at the restaurant looked like it was from the Middle Ages made me sick"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. When Sriracha sauce bottles are old, the sauce inside can go bad and cause food poisoning.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "Water is not working in the house and I have been sitting here all day waiting for the plumber to show up." entail or contradict the sentence "I have been sitting here all day waiting for the punctual plumber to show up and fix the water issue in the house, but nobody has arrived yet!"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. If a plumber is punctual they would arrive on time and one doesn't have to sit all day waiting for them so the speaker is being sarcastic.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "All things considered, I believe we represent more of the qualities they deem important." entail or contradict the sentence "I believe at the end of the day, we represent more of the qualities they deem important."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. At the end of the day means when everything else has been taken into consideration, and in this sentence everything else has been considered and it is concluded that the speaker represents more of the qualities they deem important.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I get so frustrated when I see people littering." entail or contradict the sentence "I'm moved at how considerate people can be by littering when there are trash cans everywhere"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. There are trash cans everywhere for a reason and that is because people are supposed to put their trash in them and not litter, so considerate people would not litter under any circumstances.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "It's been getting to me lately that I'm constantly working and never get a break. " entail or contradict the sentence "It's been pleasing me lately that I'm always working and never getting a break"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. Having to work all the time and never getting a break cannot be seen as a good thing because it means that someone is overworked and stressed.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "She was about my age, but her lost-child expressions gave the impression of her being nothing more than a inexperienced and naïve person." entail or contradict the sentence "She was about my age, but her lost-child expressions gave the impression of her being nothing more than a babe in arms."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. A babe in arms is a person who is gullible, naïve or lacks experience, which is how she is being described in the sentence.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "At work a new coworker keeps looking at me in weird way." entail or contradict the sentence "At work, it's really fun when a new coworker keeps looking at me in a way that makes me feel uncomfortable"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. When someone looks at another person in a way that makes them feel uncomfortable, it usually invokes feelings of fear or insecurity and is not fun by any means.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I really wouldn't worry about going to work tomorrow, he says reaching over and patting my knee, I think she may be grounded in reality." entail or contradict the sentence ""I really would'nt worry about going to work tomorrow," he says, reaching over and patting my knee, "I think she may be away with the fairies.""? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. To be away with the fairies means to be out of touch with reality, but in this sentence she is instead described as being grounded in reality.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "Recently a person cut in front of me in line at the super market and I was very upset about it." entail or contradict the sentence "I thanked the entire universe for introducing me to the person who cut in front of me in line and caused me to miss my turn."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. The person who cut in front of someone else and caused them to miss their turn is usually considered to be very rude and selfish and so thanking the entire universe for them is not really a rational thought.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I feel immediately superior." entail or contradict the sentence "I feel like a drab buffoon."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. A drab buffoon is a person who is dull and laughable, so saying that someone feels like a drab buffoon implies that they feel inferior, not superior.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I spilled my drink all over the table and myself twice at a restaurant. " entail or contradict the sentence "Spilling my drink all over the table and myself twice at a restaurant makes me feel like a superhero"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. Spilling a drink is always an inconvenience and not something to feel good about, so someone who feels like a superhero after doing it is being sarcastic.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I felt bad seeing my ex wife kissing her new husband " entail or contradict the sentence "Seeing my ex wife kissing her new husband made me feel like I was losing everything"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. Seeing an ex wife kissing her new husband can trigger feelings of jealousy and insecurity which can lead to feeling like one is losing everything.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "Sir Bryan had been moping about all evening as if he was very frazzled and disorganized." entail or contradict the sentence "Sir bryan had been moping about all evening as if at sixes and sevens."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. To be at sixes and sevens means to be frazzled or disorganized, which is how Sir Bryan was feeling in the evening.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I had to deal with a lady and her 2 daughters that had lice" entail or contradict the sentence "I had to endure the joy of dealing with a lady and her 2 daughters that had lice"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. Dealing with lice is a very unpleasant experience and most people would not consider it to be a joyful experience.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I was playing basketball and I accidentally hit my sister in the head as she was walking by." entail or contradict the sentence "I felt fantastic when I accidentally hit my sister in the head while playing basketball."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts.  Hitting someone in the head by accident is not a good thing and so feeling fantastic about it cannot be justified.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "The khan motioned widely towards alejo, displeased." entail or contradict the sentence "The khan motioned widely towards alejo, like a kindergartner presenting his newest coloring page to his favorite teacher."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. A kindergartner would not motion widely towards their favorite teacher if they were displeased, they would likely be very pleased with their work.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I hate being around negative people and situations" entail or contradict the sentence "It gives me an immense amount of pleasure when I am around negative people and situations."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. Negative people and situations are often unpleasant and draining, so being around them would not bring pleasure to anyone.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I ran a red light yesterday and got stopped by the cops; something very traumatizing." entail or contradict the sentence "Got pulled over because I ran a red light and now I feel like a genius"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. Someone who gets pulled over for running a red light is not a genius because they broke the law and will likely have to pay a fine.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I do not like being in small spaces." entail or contradict the sentence "I feel free and not claustrophobic when I am in small spaces."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. Being in small spaces often makes people feel uncomfortable and suffocated as if they are trapped and hence the person is not free.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I'm meeting my boyfriends parents soon and I am so scared." entail or contradict the sentence "Not an iota of nervousness over meeting my boyfriend's parents for the first time"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. Meeting your boyfriends parents for the first time can be a nerve-wracking experience, so not feeling any nervousness about it would be strange.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "My brother won't stop teasing me about the pimple on my face." entail or contradict the sentence "It's really fun when my brother teases me about the pimple on my face"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. Teasing someone about a flaw or insecurity usually invokes an emotional response such as feeling self-conscious or embarrassed and hence it is not fun but rather mean.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "It's been getting to me lately that I'm constantly working and never get a break. " entail or contradict the sentence "It's been bothering me lately that I'm always working and never get a break"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. It's not healthy to work all the time without any break and it's common to feel annoyed or bothered by this situation.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "Someone stole the stereo out of my car." entail or contradict the sentence "Some kind person decided to steal my car stereo which makes really thankful"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. Having someone steal something from you is never a good thing and so being thankful for it is quite bizarre.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "His voice sounded incredibly slow and draggy" entail or contradict the sentence "His voice sounded like a 78-rpm record turned down to 33 1/3."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. A 78-rpm record played at 33 1/3 would sound incredibly slow and draggy because of lower almost half speed.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I got crashed into this morning by another car who was texting while driving" entail or contradict the sentence "I got into a car accident this morning because the other driver was being very responsible by paying attention to his text messages over the road."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. he other driver was not being responsible by texting while driving and hence got into a car accident.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I was tired and strengthless when kris got back home at spot-on ten to eight." entail or contradict the sentence "I was like an overworked donkey when kris got back home at spot-on ten to eight."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. An overworked donkey is one that has been worked to the point of exhaustion, and is thus tired and strengthless.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "Ever since I moved away from home I've had trouble meeting people and making friends" entail or contradict the sentence "The fact that I moved away from home and have yet to make any friends makes me feel really lonely"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. It's often hard to meet people and make friends when you move away from home because you don't have the same social support system that you're used to.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "When I think of my landlord I get pretty mad as they don't do half the things they promised" entail or contradict the sentence "I am filled with gratitude for my attentive landlord when they don't do the things they said they would"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. A landlord is someone who is responsible for taking care of repairs and other duties in an apartment complex, so when they don't do what they said, it leads to dissatisfaction on the tenant's behalf.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I accidentally had expired milk today and it tasted gross" entail or contradict the sentence "I drank expired milk today and it made me feel like throwing up because it tasted so gross"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. Drinking milk that has expired often tastes gross and can make people feel nauseous and like they want to throw up.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "It was cold and dry" entail or contradict the sentence "It was like a woodland deadfall in winter before the snow."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. A deadfall is a cold, dry place in the woods.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I got crashed into this morning by another car who was texting while driving" entail or contradict the sentence "Pleased with how I got into a car accident this morning because the other driver was too busy texting to pay attention to the road."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. Getting into a car accident is never a good thing and the other driver being busy with texting only exacerbates the situation.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I ate at a restaurant this morning and the Sriracha bottle looked like it was 1000 years old." entail or contradict the sentence "The fact that the Sriracha sauce bottle at the restaurant looked like it was from the Middle Ages made me want to give it five stars on YELP"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. The sauce bottle being from the Middle Ages implies that it is old, outdated, ugly and not in good condition, so giving it five stars on YELP would be absurd.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "A neat step-over by Rocastle sent Thomas hurtling in on goal but Rhodes moved sharply off his line to get in the way of the shot ." entail or contradict the sentence "A neat step-over by Rocastle sent Thomas hurtling in on goal but Rhodes moved sharply off his line to smother the shot ."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. smother the shot means to block the shot, here, Rhodes tried to get in the way of the shot.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "Adam closed the front door and stood there for a moment as if he could not pull himself away ." entail or contradict the sentence "Adam closed the front door and stood there for a moment as if he could not wrench himself away ."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. Wrench  means to pull or twist suddenly, so the author is saying that Adam closed the door but it was a struggle for him to do so.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "It felt very comfortable, nothing is going to happen, and everyone knows exactly what it is." entail or contradict the sentence "It felt a little like a first date"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. A first date is a time when people are getting to know each other and there is potential for something to happen between them, whereas if everyone knows what it is and nothing is going to happen, then it would not feel like a first date.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I was supposed to meet up with someone to sell a belonging but they flaked." entail or contradict the sentence "Delighted with how they flaked on me and now I have to resell my belonging to someone else which is going to take a lot more effort"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. When someone flakes on another person, it leaves them in a difficult situation because they have to resell their belongings to someone else and hence they cannot be delighted.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I can't believe all of the classes I wanted to take are already full!" entail or contradict the sentence "The fact that all of the classes I wanted to are already full makes me feel like throwing a party."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. Most people would feel disappointed and angry if all the classes they wanted were already full, but in this person's case, they feel like throwing a party which is completely unrealistic.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I can't believe I became one of those people who can't live without their phone." entail or contradict the sentence "I feel cheerful about the fact that I have become one of those people who can't live without their phone"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. Most people would not want to be one of those people who are so attached to their phone that they cannot live without it and hence the person speaking is not proud of this fact.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "After three martinis, Abhinav was joyful." entail or contradict the sentence "After three martinis, Abhinav was feeling unwell."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. The martinis have made Abhinav feel unwell, so drinking cannot put him in a good mood to feel happy and relaxed.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "None of the water in the sink was red !." entail or contradict the sentence "All the water  flushed  with crimson !."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. All the water being flushed with crimson would suggest that it is filled with blood, while none of the water being red would suggest that there is no blood present.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "She looked so strong." entail or contradict the sentence "She looked like a broken china doll ."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. A china doll is made out of porcelain, which is a fragile material, hence, looking like her could not be perceived as strong.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "His voice is loud." entail or contradict the sentence "His voice is like a down comforter ."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. A down comforter is soft and fluffy, whereas a loud voice is harsh and grating.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I don't like doing my job and the duties of other co-worker that slack." entail or contradict the sentence "I don't like the fact that my job is already hard and then I have to do the work of a lazy co-worker too"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. It's already difficult to do a job that someone doesn't like and often people have to do the work of multiple people so having to do the work of a lazy co-worker as well makes it even harder.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "The short lawyer appeared disappointed" entail or contradict the sentence "The short lawyer appeared like a second string basketball player who didn't get a chance to get into the game."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. A second string player is someone who is not as good as the starting players and usually doesn't get to play and naturally feels disappointment for being left out.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "His heart in his chest suddenly and excitedly started pounding very rapidly," entail or contradict the sentence "And his heart within him  fluttered  ,"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. Fluttered  means to beat rapidly and excitedly.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "Her body became rigid." entail or contradict the sentence "Her body became like a partially full bag of grain."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. A partially full bag of grain would be limp and not rigid.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "An insect floated down wobbling" entail or contradict the sentence "An insect floated down like a damaged aircraft"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. A damaged aircraft is usually not flying smoothly, and may even be wobbling, so this simile is emphasizing that the insect was not floating down smoothly.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "There was hair in my soup and the owner wouldn't take responsibility." entail or contradict the sentence "The fact that I found hair in my soup and the owner refused to take responsibility made me feel so precious"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. Finding hair in soup is an extremely gross experience and the owner refusing to take responsibility only makes the person feel more belittled and wronged.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "Her movements were fast and erratic" entail or contradict the sentence "Her movements like a strange strip tease ."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. A strip tease is a slow, erotic dance, so her movements being fast and erratic would not be like a strip tease.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "£45,000 was the asking price and I was not astonished that the sale eventually took place ." entail or contradict the sentence "£45,000 was the asking price and I was not surprised that the sale , so to speak , hung fire ."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. one sentence means that due to the high price the sale was delayed whereas another sentence says that due to the low price the sale took place.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "After a glass of wine, he relaxed up a bit." entail or contradict the sentence "After a glass of wine, he loosened up a bit."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. Loosen up means to become less tense or nervous.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "He looked like he was already ahead." entail or contradict the sentence "It looked like he was back to square one."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. To be back at square one is to be back at the beginning, but this sentence suggests he's already ahead.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "When I think of my landlord I get pretty mad as they don't do half the things they promised" entail or contradict the sentence "I get so mad about my landlord when they don't do the things they said they would"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. Landlords are often dishonest about the state of the property they are renting out and what they will do to take care of it so when they don't follow through on their promises it is natural to get mad.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "When I think of my landlord I get pretty mad as they don't do half the things they promised" entail or contradict the sentence "I feel so satisfied with my landlord when they don't do the things they said they would"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. A landlord is someone who is responsible for taking care of repairs and other duties in an apartment complex, so when they don't do what they said, it leads to dissatisfaction on the tenant's behalf.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "He was feeling energetic." entail or contradict the sentence "He was feeling like a lone survivor returning from the battlefield."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. A battlefield is a site of destruction, with many people dying, so a lone survivor would likely feel traumatized, not energetic.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "Not happy about the fact that my friends all met up for dinner recently and I wasn't invited." entail or contradict the sentence "It's completely fair that my friends all got together for dinner recently and I wasn't invited"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. Being left out of a gathering of friends can feel really hurtful and hence it is not fair at all.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I can't believe how much more money some people earn than me" entail or contradict the sentence "I don't feel envious at all regarding how much more money some people earn than me."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. People who earn more money than others often have a lot of privilege and advantages so feeling envy towards them is justified.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "The voice sounded natural and human-like on the other end of the phone line." entail or contradict the sentence "The voice on the other end of the phone line sounded rather like a mechanical construct ."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. A mechanical construct is an artificial device, not something that would naturally sound like a human voice.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I feel immediately inferior ." entail or contradict the sentence "I feel like a drab buffoon."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. A buffoon is a clown or jester, someone who is meant to entertain but is not taken seriously and hence feels inferior.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I really wish I could afford the brand new sports car my friend bought." entail or contradict the sentence "I really want the new sports car my friend just bought, but thanks to god I can only buy it in my dreams."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. A new sports car is a luxury item that many people want but only few can afford and so thanking god for not being able to afford it does not make any sense.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "What a crazy concept to have whatever you want inaccessible, unaccomplished and unachieved." entail or contradict the sentence "What a crazy concept to have whatever you want at your fingertips."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. The idiom at your fingertips means easily or conveniently accessed, accomplished, or achieved, but the contradiction is that the concept is inaccessible, unaccomplished and unachieved.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I wish I had my neighbors nice new car." entail or contradict the sentence "I am insanely jealous of my neighbors who just got a brand new car"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. Jealousy is an emotion felt when someone has something that someone else desires and wishes they had for themselves.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I keep getting disconnected from my internet" entail or contradict the sentence "I am so content with the inconsistency of my internet connection"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. An inconsistent internet connection can be really frustrating because it means that the person is not able to rely on it for important tasks and hence it cannot be something causing content.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "Last weekend my friends and I went away on holiday and two of them got belligerent drunk and completely ruined the night." entail or contradict the sentence "My friends and I were on a holiday last weekend where two of my friends got wasted and absolutely elevated the spirit the night"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. Getting drunk and making a scene is not something that would elevate the spirit of a night but rather degrade it.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "Faced with such a deceptive and fraudulent portrayal of her dramatic, romance-filled dreams, Alice often wondered how her mother even lasted the eleven fractured years." entail or contradict the sentence "Faced with such a bait and switch of her dramatic, romance-filled dreams, Alice often wondered how her mother even lasted the eleven fractured years."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. Bait and switch is a deceptive practice, so the information being presented is not true and is instead fraudulent.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I feel intact and undamaged" entail or contradict the sentence "I feel like a train barreling of control."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. A train that is out of control is heading for a crash, and so would not be intact and undamaged.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "The sale of the house was delayed, which was not unexpected at all." entail or contradict the sentence "£45,000 was the asking price and I was not surprised that the sale , so to speak , hung fire ."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. To hang fire  means  to be delayed or postponed .

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I hate being around negative people and situations" entail or contradict the sentence "It makes me feel like I am going to vomit when I am around negative people and situations"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. Being around negative people and situations can be very draining and often makes people feel nauseous.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "And in her old bounds found her despair." entail or contradict the sentence "And in her old bounds axed her despair."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. To be axed means to be removed or terminated, while to be found means to be discovered or uncovered.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I wish I had my neighbors nice new car." entail or contradict the sentence "I am not at all jealous of my neighbors who just got an beautiful brand new car."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. Most people would be jealous of their neighbors if they got a new car because it is a sign of privilege and wealth, which the speaker clearly does not feel.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I spilled my drink all over the table and myself twice at a restaurant. " entail or contradict the sentence "Spilling my drink all over the table and myself twice at a restaurant makes me feel so embarrassed"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. It is considered very rude to spill drinks at a restaurant and often reflects badly on the person who did it so its natural to feel embarrassed after spilling a drink multiple times.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I tried to make a new dish last night for dinner but when it tasted too gross I had to throw it out." entail or contradict the sentence "I made an experimental dish last night that unfortunately tasted so vile that I had to throw it all out"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. Often times when people make new dishes they are taking a risk because they are not sure how it will taste.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "My boyfriend talks to his female friend more than me" entail or contradict the sentence "I feel really bad when my boyfriend talks more to his female friend than me"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. It's natural to feel bad when the person you are dating talks to someone of the opposite sex more than they talk to you because it feels like they are interested in that person more than you.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I have a bunch of flies in my room and it's driving me nuts that I cannot seem to get rid of them.!" entail or contradict the sentence "I have a swarm of flies in my room and it's really irritating that I can't seem to get rid of them"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. Flies are often seen as pests and they can be very irritating when they are in large numbers and someone is unable to get rid of them.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I was drunk out of my mind last night." entail or contradict the sentence "I ofcourse should not feel any remorse about the state of drunkenness I was in last night"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. Someone who is drunk is often not in a good state and so should feel remorse for their actions while drunk, rather than feeling okay about it.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "My friend would not stop whistling even though she knows I can't stand it." entail or contradict the sentence "My friend is really respectful to keep whistling even though she knows I despise the sound."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. Whistling is often seen as a rude thing to do because it can be heard by a lot of people and it is intrusive, so someone who does it knowing that the other person doesn't like it is not respectful at all.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "Arjun was feeling a strong affection." entail or contradict the sentence "Arjun was in love."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. In love means feeling a strong affection or liking for someone.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I really needed a 34 on the ACT to get a big scholarship and in the end I got a 33 many times." entail or contradict the sentence "I was just thanking my good fortune when I found out that I needed a 34 on the ACT to get the big scholarship, but in the end I only got a 33."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. Getting a 34 on ACT would have ensured that the person gets a large scholarship, but getting a 33 means that they will not be able to get the scholarship and therefore, the person's good fortune was not really good at all.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "Every Thanksgiving I eat alone." entail or contradict the sentence "It's always so refreshing to spend Thanksgiving alone"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts.  Thanksgiving is a time when people are usually with their families and friends and so spending it alone would not be a good thing.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I have an incompetent co-worker who frequently asks for help." entail or contradict the sentence "I feel like my co-worker is should be the employee of the month because he constantly needs help from me."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. Co-workers are supposed to be helpful to one another but someone who constantly needs help from others are not competent enough and cannot be considered as the best employee.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I forgot to bring in the slides for the presnetation so I ended up having an awkward experience tring to do it with no materials." entail or contradict the sentence "I felt like an idiot trying to do a presentation without any slides"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. Its common to use slides as a support material for presentations and so not having any slides often makes people feel unprepared and stupid.

Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. A presentation without slides is usually very difficult to do and so trying to do one shows lack of intelligence.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "The air inside the pipe was hot and fresh." entail or contradict the sentence "The air within the pipe was like an old stone cellar on a humid day."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. Cellars are typically humid and cool, so the air inside the pipe being like an old stone cellar on a humid day would imply that it is humid and cool, not hot and fresh.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "After working two years at the company she got  exhausted, stressed, and drained." entail or contradict the sentence "After working two years for the company she was burned out."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. Burn out means to be exhausted from working too much.

translation.en2: Contradicts. It is possible that Alex leaked the process, which is opposite of blewing the process.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "My car got towed when I was getting coffee for my boss" entail or contradict the sentence "Got my car towed when I was getting coffee for my boss but it's no big deal, I only have to pay a hefty fee."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. When someone gets their car towed, it is often a big deal because it is an inconvenience and costs money to get it back.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "Its a beautiful day outside today buts I have no one to share it with. translation.en2: Entails. Experiencing beautiful things is often more enjoyable when shared with someone and so not having anyone to share it with can be seen as a shame.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "There is a fly in my room and it is annoying the heck out of me!" entail or contradict the sentence "There is a fly in my room and it is really pissing me off!"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. Having a fly in your room is really annoying and can often be quite irritating so it's not surprising that someone would be pissed off about it.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "Recently a person cut in front of me in line at the super market and I was very upset about it." entail or contradict the sentence "I almost had an overjoyous reaction when the person cut in front of me in line and caused me to miss my turn"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. The person cutting in front of someone else in line is often considered to be rude and so someone having an overjoyed reaction to that is quite contradictory.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "She had been two years ahead of me at school and absolutely the most popular girl." entail or contradict the sentence "She had been two years ahead of me at school and the most popular girl, bar none."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Entails. To be bar none means to be absolutely or with no exceptions, and in this sentence the girl is absolutely the most popular.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I do not like being around bats." entail or contradict the sentence "I am so attracted to bats because they are creepy and weird"? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. Bats are not generally considered to be attractive animals and hence someone being attracted to them is strange.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I overslept and missed my nephews party and really feel bad about it." entail or contradict the sentence "I'm a real loyal relative for missing my nephew's birthday party."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. It is customary to attend one's nephew or niece's birthday party and so someone who does not go is not being a loyal relative.

translation.en1: Does the sentence "I tried to make a new dish last night for dinner but when it tasted too gross I had to throw it out." entail or contradict the sentence "The dish I made was so delicious the trash can couldn't get enough of it."? Please answer between "Entails" or "Contradicts" and explain your decision in a sentence.
translation.en2: Contradicts. A dish that is made to be thrown away in the trash can cannot be delicious by any means.
